full_summary:
# TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT
**Tender Title:** Test 12/03 SSC Test 12/03 - Amendment 000
**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00013234:T
**Solicitation Number:** BPM011462/13234
**Publication Date:** April 24, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 6, 2021 @ 09:00:00 (Expired)

## Tender Details
**Category:** Construction Services
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive Limited Tendering
**Selection Criteria:** Not Applicable

## Contracting Entity
**Name:** Shared Services Canada
**Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, K0A 0C3, Canada

## Contact Information
**Name:** GianMarco DeMeis (Admin), Administrator
**Phone:** 613-999-9999, **Fax:** 613-999-9999
**Email:** [Missing Information]

## Tender Description
The Government of Canada, represented by Shared Services Canada, invites qualified suppliers to provide construction site planning services under the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement. The Contracting Entity seeks a supplier to provide the services as described in this notice.

Technical Specifications can be downloaded from this tender. The tender closing date was December 6, 2021, at 09:00:00, and it has expired.

Note: The regions of opportunity are specific to Alberta, and delivery regions are across Canada. If you are interested in bidding for this tenders, you have to act swiftly as the Tenders have already expired. Reach out to the contracting entity or contact person to figure out ways of collaboration. 
**AMENDMENT:** TTC TEAM ARE AWARDED AND REST OF THE RESPONSIBILITY LIES WITH THE CONTRACTING  ENTITY
